title: Kannukulle Unnai Vaithen Lyrics Pennin Manathai Thottu
stanzas:
Kannukulle Unnai Vaithen Song Lyrics Pennin Manathai Thottu
#UnniKrishnan

kannukulle unnai
vaithen kannamma
naan kangal mooda
maattenadi sellamma
naan kangal mooda
maattenadi sellamma

adi neethaan en santhosham
poovellaam un vaasam
nee paesum pechellaam
naan ketkum sangeetham
un punnagai naan
semikindra selvam adi
nee illai endraal
naanum ingae ezhai adi

nedungaalamaai mudangaamale
enakulle nesam kidankindrathe
unai paarthathum uyir thoondave
uthadugal thaandi therikindrathe

tharithaana yen nenjil
vizhunthaaye vithaiyaaga
nee anbaai paarkum paarvayile
en jeevan vaazhuthadi

kannukulle unnai
vaithen kannamma
naan kangal mooda
maattenadi adi sellamma
naan kangal mooda
maattenadi sellamma

mazhai megamaai
uru maarava
un vaasal vathu
Â uyir thoovava

kannaaga karuthaaga
unai kaapen uyiraaga
unai kandaen kaninthen
kalanthene ada
unnul uraintheney

kannukulle unnai
vaithen kannamma
naan kangal mooda
maattenadi sellamma
naan kangal mooda
maattenadi sellamma

adi neethaan en santhosham
poovellaam un vaasam
nee paesum pechellaam
naan ketkum sangeetham
un punnagai naan
semikindra selvam adi
nee illai endraal
naanum ingae ezhai adi
